hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin echo "Cleanup previous build" rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/ obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu
echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/
python client.py checkout
echo "Cleanup" ./mozilla/mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug ac_add_options --enable-application=mail ac_add_options --enable-calendar
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j24" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
cov-configure --gcc --xml-option=skip_file:"(\/tmp\/.*\.(cpp|cc|c))|(\/usr\/.*)|(mozilla\/.*)"
echo "Rebuild all" cov-build --dir cov-int ./mozilla/mach --log-no-times build -v
tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=120000 actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi
#cd .. rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/ obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu
exit 0
# old method, after ./mozilla/mach
echo "Only rebuild tb and not fx" cd obj-x86_64-*-linux-gnu make export make cov-configure --gcc --xml-option=skip_file:"/tmp/*"
cat > rebuild.sh <<EOF #!/bin/bash set -e export COMPS=CXX=/usr/bin/g++ CC=/usr/bin/gcc cd mailnews/&& make clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd calendar/lightning/ && make clean && cd - cd calendar/libical && make clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd calendar/base/backend/libical/ && make clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd calendar/lightning/ && make all \$COMPS && cd - cd db/ && make clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd ldap/xpcom/ && make clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd mail/ && make clean all \$COMPS && cd - EOF
chmod +x rebuild.sh
cov-build --dir cov-int $(pwd)/rebuild.sh
